title: New: Osca – Around The Bends
body:
London quartet **Osca** sound like they want to be the biggest band in the world, and with their track record to date, there’s no reason why they can’t be.

From the Sky Sports featured Blood, to Hype Machine hit Illume, alongside latest offering, _Around The Bends_, they pen epic, rousing anthems at their very first. This is essentially the song that Coldplay forgot to include on Mylo Xyloto. Check it out below.

From the Sky Sports featured Blood, to Hype Machine hit Illume, alongside latest offering, Around The Bends, they pen epic, rousing anthems at their very first. \[…\]
